entry.title: WIND WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near Tumbler Ridge this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near Tumbler Ridge this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
